document.topic_text: How Do You Compare to the Competition? Get facts about other applicants with a CareerBuilder Account Sign Up Job Description BAE Systems is looking for a Logistics Assistant (LA) with a minimum of 5 years of logistics or supply experience. The LA provides logistics support to the CITP program in response to government, CITP Operations Support Officer, and CITP Branch SPA guidance. The LA coordinates logistics requirements for CITP with NGIC Enterprise Services (ES), and supported theater J, G and S-4 staffs. This positions also assists the CITP Operations team planning logistics requirements for NGIC-based CITP analysts and analysts deployed to Afghanistan. Minimum Education and Experience Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience Experience requesting, receiving, accounting for and shipping equipment and supplies is essential for this position. Experience with JWICS, SIPRNET and NIPRNET tools and databases used to support logistics activities. Working knowledge of Microsoft® Office® tools, including SharePoint®. A high school diploma or GED is required. Preferred Skills and Education Experience in Military Occupational Speciality (MOS) 92A, or DoD joint service or civilian equivalent is desired. About BAE Systems Intelligence & Security BAE Systems Intelligence & Security, based in McLean, Virginia, designs and delivers advanced defense, intelligence, and security solutions that support the important missions of our customers. Our pride and dedication shows in everything we do-from intelligence analysis, cyber operations and IT expertise to systems development, systems integration, and operations and maintenance services. Knowing that our work enables the U.S. military and government to recognize, manage and defeat threats inspires us to push ourselves and our technologies to new levels. That's BAE Systems. That's Inspired Work. Equal Opportunity Employer/Females/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Gender Expression. To see Inspired Work in action, visit www.baesystems.com and follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/baesystemsintel. EEO Career Site Equal Opportunity Employer.
